name: BackrooMZ
description:
Why this happened to me?!

I just, I just want to live this life Calmly and Peacefully!

And then I'm trapped in this BackrooMZ, How Insane!

Don't give up, Richard Winston!

Let's get out of here!!!

Game Content:

- Deep and Unique Three Main Characters.

- Gathering Items from the Chest in a place like a Maze.

- Use a Mirror to Access The Shops.

- Front View Battle System

- Collect as many Life Gear and get out of BackrooMZ .

- Collect 20 Notes in BackrooMZ.

- Mystery of BackrooMZ Awaits You.

For This My Second Game I Develop,

I Want to Say a Big Thank You to:

- Allah SWT.

- RPG Maker MZ.

- The Backrooms (Origin Story, Game, Film, etc) that has Inspired My Game.

BGM from Youtube, I Want to Say a Big Thank You to:

- Violin Garden - Go Tell Aunt Rhody.

- Vivek Abhishek - Music Box.

- Makai Symphony - The Army of Minotaur.
